name: Greater Manchester Rail Ranger (day ranger)
description: GREATER MANCHESTER RAIL RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day on all trains in the Greater Manchester area.

LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London King's Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them.
